00046 #define FILTER_DEPTH 16
00047 
00048 typedef struct channel {
00049   unsigned char insertion_point;
00050   unsigned short channel_data[FILTER_DEPTH];
00051   unsigned short raw_result;
00052   unsigned short filtered_result;
00053 } channel_t;
00054
